name: Pugio
description:
This is a stealth action game where you have to hook on to walls and escape an underground facility to hide from dangerous robots that are out to get you.
Use your mobility to your advantage and finish the game as fast as possible.

Controls

WASD -> Movement
LMB -> Stab/Hook

SPACE -> Jump

Thanks to those guys for making this game

megamika

durianwater https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NBFuzr_GnqQ&ab_channel=Bobacupcake
